summary: Completed testing of STEP 2 - Real Horizon Binding for Fractal Terminal. HorizonSelector UI and tier color coding working correctly, but some data loading issues identified.

integration_issues.issue: FocusInfoPanel and FocusStatsBadge components not rendering despite data being available
Showing 'Failed to load strategy data' error message
Error: Failed to execute 'json' on 'Response': body stream already read
forecast-summary and matches-list components not displaying despite API working

passed_tests: Horizon buttons are clickable and responsive
Tier color coding working (TIMING/TACTICAL/STRUCTURE views displayed correctly)
Backend API /api/fractal/v2.1/focus-pack working for all horizons
Focus-pack API returns correct distributionSeries length for each horizon
API returns appropriate matches count for different horizons
Backend chart data endpoint working correctly

action_item_for_main_agent.data_loading_issues: Fix FocusInfoPanel and FocusStatsBadge rendering - components exist in code but not displaying
action_item_for_main_agent.api_response_handling: Fix JSON response parsing error - 'body stream already read' suggests double consumption
action_item_for_main_agent.strategy_data_error: Investigate 'Failed to load strategy data' error - possibly related to strategy panel API call
action_item_for_main_agent.forecast_components: Ensure forecast-summary and matches-list components render when focus-pack data is available

success_percentage.backend: 95% - Focus-pack API working correctly for all horizons with proper data structure
success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Horizon selector and switching working perfectly, but data display components have rendering issues
